code: import*as request from"./requester";var baseUrl='http://localhost:3030/data/items';export var getAll=function getAll(){return request.get(baseUrl);};export var getOne=function getOne(itemId){return request.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(itemId));};export var create=function create(itemData){return request.post(baseUrl,itemData);};export var edit=function edit(itemId,itemData){return request.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(itemId),itemData);};export var remove=function remove(itemId){return request.del("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(itemId));};
